home.header: Real farmers. Real food. Real connections.
home.subheader: Discover fresh, organic produce from farmers in your community. Support local agriculture and eat healthier today.

enthusiasts.title: Discover and buy organic food directly from local farmers
enthusiasts.description: Finding trustworthy local sources for fresh, organic food shouldn't be hard. Connect directly with nearby organic farmers through interactive maps, authentic reviews, and real-time communication.

farmers.title: Sell your organic produce directly to local customers—no middlemen
farmers.description: Reaching local customers without costly ads or intermediaries is now simple. Showcase your products, chat with buyers, and build a loyal community of local supporters.

organizers.title: Empower your community to share and grow through local food networks
organizers.description: Building strong local networks for sustainable trade doesn't have to be fragmented. Connect producers and consumers through shared exchanges and powerful communication tools.

cta.title: Are you a farmer?
cta.description: Join our marketplace and connect with customers who value organic, locally-grown produce.

about.title: About LocalRoots
about.tagline: Real farmers. Real food. Real connections.
about.story: LocalRoots was born from a simple idea: good food should bring people together — not drive them apart. We believe in a food system built on trust, fairness, and community, not profit margins and middlemen.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: To connect small-scale organic farmers and local food growers directly with the people who care about what they eat — and the land it comes from.
mission.paragraph2: No intermediaries, no inflated prices — just honest trade, fair pay, and shared respect for the earth.

direct.title: Direct Connection
direct.description: We make it easy for customers to find and support local growers, and for farmers to share their harvest directly with their community. Every purchase strengthens real relationships, not algorithms.

fair.title: Fair and Transparent Trade
fair.description: Farmers set their own prices. You know exactly who you're supporting and where your food comes from. Fair trade isn't just a label here — it's how we live.

sustainable.title: Local and Sustainable
sustainable.description: By reducing transport distances, we lower costs, carbon emissions, and waste — helping local economies and ecosystems thrive together.

community.title: Community First
community.description: LocalRoots is more than a marketplace — it's a network of people who believe in mutual aid, ecological living, and food sovereignty. Inspired by the ideas of thinkers like Murray Bookchin, we see local food systems as a foundation for stronger, freer communities.

real.title: No AI, Just People
real.description: In an era of automation and synthetic everything, we stay rooted in what's real. LocalRoots is built by humans, for humans — a space where authenticity and care still matter.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.description: Whether you're a farmer, gardener, or simply someone who loves good food, LocalRoots is your community. Together, we can grow a food system that nourishes both people and the planet.
cta.tagline: Grow local. Eat honest. Live connected.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | LocalRoots
privacy.description: Learn how LocalRoots collects, uses, and protects your personal information
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: LocalRoots ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our marketplace platform connecting local organic farmers with customers.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information You Provide
items: Account registration information (name, email address, password)
Profile information (for farmers: farm name, description, location, website)
Contact information (phone number, physical address)
Payment information (processed securely through third-party payment processors)

farmerInfo.title: Farmer-Specific Information
items: Farm location and geolocation coordinates
Product listings (images, descriptions, prices)
Business details and certifications
Communication with customers through our platform

automaticInfo.title: Information Collected Automatically
items: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Usage data (pages visited, features used, time spent on platform)
Location data (with your permission, for distance-based product filtering)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To provide and maintain our marketplace services
To process transactions and send order notifications
To connect farmers with customers in their local area
To improve our platform and develop new features
To communicate with you about your account and our services
To ensure platform security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: With farmers when you place an order (name, contact information, delivery address)
With service providers who help us operate our platform (AWS for image storage, payment processors)
When required by law or to protect our legal rights
With your explicit consent for other purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including encryption of passwords, secure database storage, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
items: Authentication: Google OAuth, Facebook OAuth (governed by their respective privacy policies)
Image Storage: AWS S3 (subject to Amazon Web Services privacy policy)
Maps: OpenStreetMap (subject to OpenStreetMap privacy policy)

yourRights.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Delete your account and associated data
Object to certain processing of your information
Export your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use third-party advertising cookies or tracking pixels.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your information, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions | LocalRoots
terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using the LocalRoots marketplace platform
terms.heading: Terms and Conditions

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using LocalRoots, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.content: LocalRoots is an online marketplace platform that connects local organic farmers with customers seeking fresh, locally-sourced products. We provide the technology platform but are not a party to transactions between farmers and customers.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
items: Be at least 18 years of age
Have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts
Not be prohibited from using the service under applicable laws

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.intro: When you create an account, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain and update your information to keep it accurate
Maintain the security of your password and account
Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account

farmerResponsibilities.title: Farmer Responsibilities
farmerResponsibilities.intro: If you register as a farmer, you agree to:
items: Accurately represent your products, prices, and availability
Comply with all applicable food safety regulations and certifications
Fulfill orders in a timely manner as agreed with customers
Maintain organic or other claimed certifications where applicable
Set fair and honest prices for your products
Respond promptly to customer inquiries and concerns

customerResponsibilities.title: Customer Responsibilities
customerResponsibilities.intro: If you register as a customer, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate delivery information
Pay for orders as agreed with farmers
Treat farmers with respect and professionalism
Report any issues or concerns promptly through proper channels

transactions.title: Transactions and Payments
items: Transactions are directly between farmers and customers
LocalRoots facilitates the connection but is not responsible for transaction fulfillment
Payment terms are agreed upon between farmers and customers
Disputes should be resolved directly between the parties involved

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
items: Use the platform for any illegal purpose
Post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
Harass, abuse, or harm other users
Interfere with or disrupt the platform's operation
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the platform
Use automated systems (bots, scrapers) without permission
Resell or commercially exploit the platform without authorization

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.platform: The LocalRoots platform, including its design, code, and content, is owned by LocalRoots and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our platform without permission.
intellectual.userContent: You retain ownership of content you post (product listings, photos, descriptions) but grant LocalRoots a license to display and distribute this content as necessary to provide our services.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: LocalRoots provides the platform on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the reliability, accuracy, or availability of the platform or products listed.
disclaimer.asIs: The platform is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, LocalRoots shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the platform. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid to LocalRoots in the past 12 months.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold LocalRoots harmless from any claims, losses, damages, liabilities, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of the platform, violation of these terms, or infringement of any rights of another party.

termination.title: Termination
termination.intro: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account:
items: For violation of these Terms and Conditions
For fraudulent, abusive, or illegal activity
At our discretion with or without cause, with reasonable notice

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated terms on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the courts of competent jurisdiction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

about.title: LocalRoots
about.description: Connecting local organic farmers with customers who value fresh, sustainable, and community-driven food.

cookieConsent.message: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
